answers.answer: Wow that is awesome! Im thinking about shutting mine too for good! This will be my 3rd. Two girls one boy.
I'll be doing that next doctor appt. This is baby #3 &at 26 with a 7,2,and a newborn that is enough for this mom. Also hubby wants to shut it down.
I signed the papers a week ago but hubby doesn't agree. Idk what to do...
I scheduled my c-section, so I can get mine done too.  I have a girl already and a boy on the way. Plus I will be 37 next month.  So I am done having babies too.

I'm all done too! Husband is getting the snip right after this little one arrives. Whoopee!! I've got a girl and a boy and I've had 2 awesome home births. But pregnancy stinks and I'm so glad to be DONE after this. I'm 32 and 3 kids is plenty for us. This is our bonus baby so we don't know the gender. It's so exciting!

Totally considering getting mine done.on baby #3, all boys! 1st baby was stuck behind my pelvic bone for 2hrs, preeclampsia with baby #2, gestatonal diabetes with this one. My body just isn't baby friendly.

I'm 22 yrs old I'll be 23 in July. You guys think that's kinda young to get them done.? My grandma thinks I'm doing it way to soon.. But I honestly don't want anymore kids.! I've never wanted kids but my babies are my blessings & I wouldn't give up being a mom to them for the world.! But I dnt want anymore ever lol. I have my boy & now my girl but what do yu guys think.??
At 22 I would highly recommend you don't do it lol , get some birth control girly. haha , you might really regret this

At 22 the doctor  may not recommend it and not want to do it. And I think if you've had more 3 or more they consider it. Iv been pregnant 4 times. Unfortunately  one was a miscarriage. I'm 26 my doctor  feel comfortable  from 25 yrs and on and with 3 kids she finds it a good choice. I don't want to take birth control for the rest of my life. I'm completely  done with being pregnant and with having more kids. Husband's won't get snipped cause he's and afraid of getting anything sharp  near his stuff. So for us it's thumbs up.

Most DR's where I live will let yu get it done as long as yu have at least 2 kids. Plus both pregnancys have been really hard for me & my body.. I absolutely do not want anymore kids I'm fine with the 2 I have lol. But I see what you guys are saying though I am kinda young to be getting it done but I don't want to take any chances of becoming prego.!Bc the next time iI'm not keeping the baby in all honesty

question: Its official ladies I have signed the papers to get my tubes tied once I have the baby.! Is it bad to say that I am excited about getting it done.? I don't want anymore kids ever.! Idc if I get married or not I just can't.! I have a boy & I will be having a girl so I'm fine. I absolutely HATE being pregnant bc the process is jus to much for my tiny body to handle.! So yeah I'm officially shutting this factory down.!!
title: Its official.!!
